title: Malcolm X
writer: Arnold Perl, Spike Lee, Alex Haley
actors: Denzel Washington, Angela Bassett, Delroy Lindo
plot: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his eventual assassination.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 19 wins & 24 nominations total
